Symptoms usually resolve within six weeks, but EN may become a chronic disorder lasting for months and, occasionally, for years. Approximately 30% cases of idiopathic EN may last more than 6 months.",GARD,"Erythema nodosum, idiopathic"
What is (are) BOD syndrome ?,"BOD syndrome is a genetic condition characterized by underdeveloped pinky toena
